MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Inverkeithing. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.09pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of confirmed fault on our underground cable network on Ferryhills road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:09PM on Wednesday 27 January 2021.
